topic.title: New Proxy Site OnlyZero.net
topic.body:
I am proud to announce a new proxy site, https://onlyzero.net
or https://onlyzero.net:43110
if you insist 
I am MilitaryRiotLab (MRL), with some help from ZeroMe, this site will run forever until I run out of money

1_1EnFfeVqTYtJfhzucfQB8Z7sCfUBipRRow.body:
Donations are always welcome,

> [phr34kz](#comment_27_1NGTMtN8816KeCtNqy6W4fCQduU4P8iwty): Bruh... fuck donations. I run a VPS too with ZeroNet. Get a job and donate to the Zero Creators instead. Smfh

agree, maybe I'll just remove the link and run this proxy until I ran out of my student loan :(

EDIT: How about now ?
